column2: BRIEF-Employers Holdings Announces CEO Retirement And Transition Plan June 9 (Reuters) - Employers Holdings Inc: * EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS ANNOUNCES CEO RETIREMENT AND TRANSITION PLAN * EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS INC - DOUGLAS DIRKS TO RETIRE IN APRIL 2021 * EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS - BOARD HAS INITIATED A SEARCH PROCESS TO IDENTIFY SUCCESSOR FOR DIRKS Source text: (bit.ly/2Ygs7PC) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Employers Holdings Files For Potential Mixed Shelf Offering May 7 (Reuters) - Employers Holdings Inc: * EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS INC FILES FOR POTENTIAL MIXED SHELF OFFERING; SIZE NOT DISCLOSED - SEC FILING Source text (bit.ly/3b7lvHO) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Employers Holdings Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.35 April 23 (Reuters) - Employers Holdings Inc: * EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2020 RESULTS; DECLARES SECOND QUARTER 2020 CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.25 PER SHARE * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.54 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * QTRLY NET PREMIUMS WRITTEN $183.4 MILLION VERSUS $208.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-On March 11, Employers Holdings' Board Authorized A Second $50 Mln Expansion Of 2018 Program, To $150 Mln March 12 (Reuters) - Employers Holdings Inc: * EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS - ON MARCH 11, BOARD AUTHORIZED A SECOND $50.0 MILLION EXPANSION OF 2018 PROGRAM, TO $150.0 MILLION * EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS - BOARD EXTENDED REPURCHASE AUTHORITY PURSUANT TO 2018 PROGRAM THROUGH JUNE 30, 2021 Source: (bit.ly/39NMUPg) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Employers Holdings Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.77 April 25 (Reuters) - Employers Holdings Inc: * EMPLOYERS HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.55 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY GROSS PREMIUMS WRITTEN OF $211.6 MILLION, UP 7% YEAR-OVER-YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Employers Holdings Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.77 April 25 (Reuters) - Employers Holdings Inc: * QTRLY GROSS PREMIUMS WRITTEN OF $211.6 MILLION, UP 7% YEAR-OVER-YEAR * QTRLY NET EARNED PREMIUMS WERE $176.6 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 1% YEAR-OVER-YEAR - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2vNgc0D) Further company coverage:
